name: Lady Veiled in Blood, 3D animation by @VicDeLeon, Music by Borrtex.
description: 40 second 3D animation of the digital clone of his 8” x 2.5” sculpture Lady Veiled in Blood (Femme Voilée de Sang) with music composed and performed by Borrtex. Original sculpture was digitally sculpted by artist Vic DeLeon and printed using sterilized human blood drawn from the artist, combined with treated photochemical bio-resin. FORMAT: MPEG Movie 1152x648 30FPS 44100Hz  More info at https://www.instagram.com/p/CIJdPKsJXii/  Artist Twitter: @VicDeLeon
